Text: Route 111 is a state highway in Massachusetts, a continuation of New Hampshire Route 111.

<Text: Massachusetts Route 111: The east–west portion of the route largely follows the path of the Union Turnpike, built in the early 19th century to connect the communities of Leominster and Concord.>
